title: Article 1 — Subject matter
full_text: [PLACEHOLDER] Full official text of Article 1 goes here.
summary: Defines the subject matter and overall purpose of the EU AI Act as a horizontal regulatory framework for artificial intelligence systems in the Union.

title: Article 5 — Prohibited AI practices
full_text: [PLACEHOLDER] Full official text of Article 5 goes here.
summary: Lists categories of AI practices that are prohibited in the EU, for example manipulative systems or those exploiting vulnerabilities of specific groups.
